meanings.definition: The study of diseases caused by dysfunction of the immune system.
meanings.sent1: Immunopathologies help us understand how the immune system can lead to diseases.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in immunopathologies focus on immune system disorders.
meanings.sent3: Studying immunopathologies is like solving a puzzle of immune-related illnesses.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of immunopathologies is like untangling a knot of immune responses.
meanings.sent5: Learning about immunopathologies is like exploring a hidden world within our bodies.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine concerned with immune system disorders.
meanings.sent1: Understanding immunopathologies is crucial for treating immune system disorders.
meanings.sent2: Immunopathologies play a key role in diagnosing and managing immune-related illnesses.
meanings.sent3: Doctors specializing in immunopathologies are like immune system detectives.
meanings.sent4: The field of immunopathologies shines a light on the complexities of our immune defenses.
meanings.sent5: Exploring immunopathologies is like navigating a maze of immune system challenges.
